headline: A calmer way for doctors to make real friends.
subheadline: Medicine is demanding. Friendships shouldn't be. BeyondRounds gives doctors the structure to show up, connect, and build lasting relationships — without the effort of organizing everything yourself.
missionP1: Doctors are surrounded by people all day — patients, nurses, colleagues — yet many describe a deep sense of social isolation outside the hospital. Long hours, rotating schedules, and frequent relocations make it nearly impossible to maintain friendships the way others do.
missionBold: The problem isn't motivation. The problem is structure.
missionP2: BeyondRounds provides that structure: small, curated groups of verified doctors who meet weekly in their city. No organizing. No guessing. Just show up.
why1Desc: 3–4 doctors per meetup. Intimate enough for real conversation.
why2Desc: Every member is verified. You know you're among peers.
why3Desc: Every weekend, a new match. Consistency builds trust.
why4Desc: Break the ice before you meet. Arrive already connected.
why5Desc: Not dating. Not networking. Just good company.
expP1: On Thursday, you'll receive your match: 3–4 doctors in your city who share your vibe and interests. A private group chat opens with conversation prompts and suggested meetup spots.
expP2: On the weekend, you meet. Maybe it's brunch at a neighbourhood spot. Maybe it's a walk along the canal. Maybe it's coffee at a quiet café. The format is simple. The connection is real.
expP3: No networking agendas. No forced icebreakers. Just a warm table and good company.
trust1Desc: Every member goes through medical license verification before joining.
trust2Desc: Clear guidelines ensure a respectful, inclusive environment.
trust3Desc: Your data stays private. We never share personal details with third parties.
trust4Desc: Easy-to-use reporting tools for any concerns, with prompt follow-up.
ctaSubtitle: Join a curated group of doctors in Berlin this weekend.

buildingConnections: Building meaningful connections beyond the hospital walls.
storyP1: The idea for BeyondRounds was born during one of those late-night hospital shifts that every doctor knows all too well. After years of moving between hospitals and diving deep into the demanding world of medicine, I found myself surrounded by colleagues — yet genuinely lonely.
storyP2: I've always been social. But something was missing. Conversations always circled back to cases, protocols, and research. Professionally enriching, sure — but I craved something deeper:
storyP2Bold: real friendships that went beyond the hospital walls.
storyP3: Everything changed when a mutual friend introduced me to four other doctors. We discovered we shared a passion for hiking, similar music tastes, and a quirky sense of humor that only made sense to fellow physicians.
storyP4Bold: if I felt this isolated despite working alongside brilliant medical minds, how many other doctors were experiencing the same thing?
storyP5: BeyondRounds was born from this realization — because when you find your tribe, everything else falls into place.

missionText: To help doctors discover friendships that enrich their lives outside the hospital. Because when you find your people — your tribe — everything else falls into place.
verifiedCommunityDesc: Only verified medical professionals, creating a trusted space for genuine connections.
beyondMedicineDesc: Connect over shared hobbies and interests, not just your specialty.
safeAndPrivateDesc: Your privacy matters. We protect your data and respect your boundaries.
ctaText: Join thousands of doctors who've already found their tribe. Your next great friendship is just one match away.
